Functions
ConfInt
Public Function ConfInt(
x,
Ys,
Xs,
alpha,
Optional RTO = False
)

Calculate the confidence interval at a point given data

Parameters
x

evaluation point

Ys

array of y values

Xs

array of x values

alpha

interval size, for 95% confidence, alpha=.05

RTO
Optional

if true, use regression through origin

PredInt
Function PredInt(
x,
Ys,
Xs,
alpha,
Optional RTO = False,
Optional q = 1
)

Calculate the prediction interval at a point given data

Parameters
x

evaluation point

Ys

array of y values

Xs

array of x values

alpha

interval size, for 95% confidence, alpha=.05

RTO
Optional

if true, use regression through origin

q
Optional

number of replicates

Returns

An interval in the Y direction above or below the SLR line of best-fit

FiducialInt
Function FiducialInt(
Yo,
Ys,
Xs,
alpha,
constant,
UpperLower
)

This is the inverse of the confidence interval. Given a Y value, what is the range on the x.

Parameters

Yo  - Ys  - Xs  - alpha  - constant  - true=calc normally; false=force to zero UpperLower - 1 = upper interval, -1 = lower interval

Returns

The interval in the x direction above or below the SLR line of best fit
